column4: i want to backup my files onto the Hard drive i used to put ubuntu on. I want to get rid of ubuntu, and i am going to format the drive to do it, but first of all, i need to have my HD have more space
try using yousendit.com or something similar to 'backup' your stuff, wipe the machine, and then backup your stuff later by downloading from yousendit.com
get a livecd of some kind. dd if=/dev/zero of=/dev/<your hard drive> bs=1024 count=99999
